_meanings:
{@--1@} Fit for a
burden, able to bear a burden &c.

{@--2@} Fit to be entrusted with 
important duties.

{@--3@} Standing at the head,
chief, foremost; see below.

{@--3@} One who carries a burden
(of responsibility); <ls>R. 5. 66.</ls>

{@--5@} A 
minister, one charged with important
duties.
